text: Need Sophie Anderson for McDonald's campaign. Budget around $4,846, looking for 2 x Instagram post, 1 x 2-minute tutorial, 1 x YouTube short, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel, 2 x 2-minute tutorial. 10 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 3 months.
